title: Verifying the Scatterplot's Pattern
text: Using the STAT then EDIT menu on a graphing utility, list the BAC values in L1 and the relative risk values in L2. Then use the STATPLOT feature to verify that the scatterplot follows the exponential pattern shown in the attached figure.\n##figure1.gif##

title: Using ExpReg on the Calculator
text: Use the “ExpReg” command from the STAT then CALC menu to obtain the exponential model, y=0.58304829(22,072,021,300)**x.
